text: Ezɨ mɨdorozim ghuavɨra ikia bar gavgavizɨ, Atrivim Ahap mɨdorozim ategh mangan iburaghburaghizɨ, me karisɨn aven puram anefazɨ, a Siriabar damazimɨn uan karisɨn aven aperaghav ikia Siriabar gari. Ezɨ an duar torim ghuzim puvɨra ivemara izaghira karis gizɨvagha, kamaghɨra itima, aruem gevima an areme.
